thread.title: Friends remember teacher who died in attack | News | yoursun.com
thread.title_full: Friends remember teacher who died in attack | News | yoursun.com

author: ELAINE ALLEN-EMRICH STAFF WRITER
title: Friends remember teacher who died in attack | News | yoursun.com
text: PORT CHARLOTTE — Friends remembered Jennifer Crumrine on Thursday as an "amazing teacher" in Charlotte County. The 54-year-old died the day after Christmas, after she was stabbed in the neck, sheriff's officials said. Deputies arrested her son, Connor Crumrine, 23, and booked him on three charges of aggravated assault and one charge of resisting an officer. kAm%96 72>:=J 925 A=2??65 E@ 8@ @? 2 4CF:D6 %F6D52J[ 3FE y6??:76C rCF>C:?6 564:565 D96 H@F=5 DE2J 369:?5 2?5 E2 6?E2= 962=E9 96=A[ 244@C5:?8 E@ C6A@CED 7C@> E96 r92C=@EE6 r@F?EJ $96C:77VD ~77:46]k^Am kAm%96 72>:=J H2D H@CC:65 27E6C k2 9C67lQ9EEADi^^HHH]J@FCDF?]4@>^492C=@EE6^?6HD^96D\DE233:?8\>6\96D\DE233:?8\>6^2CE:4=6077a_24cg\2c73\``66\hc46\5fb2gcgdag_h]9E>=Q E2C86ElQ03=2?
